about_the_game:
The Butcher

The Butcher epitomizes brute strength and an insatiable thirst for carnage. With each strike of his trusty cleaver, he revels in the symphony of bloodshed. Fueled by a primal urge to rend flesh and crush bone, the Butcher is both feared and revered on the battlefield.

Playstyle
The Butcher excels in close-quarters combat with powerful crowd control, bleeding and AOE skills, relishing the chaos of the front lines. Players who choose this class will delight in the visceral satisfaction of cleaving through hordes of foes with unmatched brutality. However, they must also be mindful of their insatiable bloodlust, lest they lose themselves to the savage frenzy that lurks within.

Recommended for:

  • Players who crave raw attack power and bleed dot build.
  • Those who enjoy the thrill of close-quarters combat and balancing between high melee damage, high life regeneration & life steal.
  • Maniacs who want to turn into a literal BLENDER

Grab Daisy, charge into the battle fields and unleash the fury of the primal within!
